p: As discussed above, oseltamivir commercialized under the trade name Tamiflu is an antiviral drug, which is being synthesized from shikimic acid. The oseltamivir help to lower down the rate of spread of influenza (flu) virus among cells in the body by interrupting the removal of the virus from its host cell. The drug is ingested orally in capsules or in the form of suspension. Both influenza A virus and influenza B virus may be treated by it.
